[event]
# to wyvern cave 3
type=on_trigger
location=36,23,1,2
intermap=maps/wyvern_cave3.txt,9,21

[event]
# to woods2
type=on_trigger
location=12,3,2,1
intermap=maps/woods2.txt,47,135

[event]
# to marshlands
type=on_trigger
location=3,19,1,2
intermap=maps/marshlands.txt,73,78

[event]
# Greenwood Point wp
type=on_trigger
location=15,24,2,2
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/town.txt,20,50
tooltip=Greenwood Point

[event]
# Activate
type=on_trigger
location=13,22,6,6
mapmod=object,15,25,265
msg=Waypoint discovered
repeat=false
requires_not_status=wp_sage_home
set_status=wp_sage_home

[event]
# waypoint mapmod
type=on_load
location=12,28,1,1
mapmod=object,15,25,265
requires_status=wp_sage_home

[event]
# Shared stash
type=on_trigger
location=15,14,1,1
hotspot=location
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
stash=true
tooltip=Shared Stash

[npc]
# Bethan
type=bethan
location=15,16,1,1
requires_not_status=minotaur_complete

[npc]
# Ieuan
type=ieuan
location=20,11,1,1
requires_not_status=minotaur_complete
requires_status=werebear_complete

[npc]
# ivan
type=ivan2
location=9,14,1,1
requires_not_status=minotaur_complete
requires_status=werebear_complete
